title.english: No Longer Allowed in Another World

description:
Pulled into an otherworldly adventure with cute sidekicks and superpowers, you’d think Osamu hit the jackpot. Nope! From a time before pixels, the early 20th-century gloomy author just wants to find a quiet place to meet his maker, not to rack up XP. Sadly, his poetic demise is constantly thwarted by inconvenient heroics. Dive into the hilariously tragic life of the most reluctant hero!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Suicide
tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.description: Target demographic is adult males.

tags.name: Satire
tags.description: Prominently features the use of comedy or ridicule to expose and criticise social phenomena.

tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Writing
tags.description: Centers around the profession of writing books or novels.

tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Heterosexual

tags.description: Prominently features the usage of drugs such as opioids, stimulants, hallucinogens etc.

tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

tags.name: Desert
tags.description: Prominently features a desert environment.

tags.name: CGI

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

Tom is a Japanese composite artist and designer affiliated with company [Digital Noise](https://d-noise.co.jp/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).

__Hometown:__ Saitama City, Saitama Prefecture, Japan
__Graduated:__ Omiya Koryo High School and SHOBI College of Music

[Profile (One Music)](https://one-music.jp/suehiro/index.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kenichiro_s) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/kenichiro.suehiro)

A Japanese pianist, composer, and arranger.

**[Website](https://mayumaeshima.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/_0414mayu) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/_0414mayu/)**

Japanese singer. She was the lead vocalist of the music unit [MYTH & ROID](https://anilist.co/staff/119976) from 2015 to 2017. She made her major debut as a solo artist in 2019. Her first solo single "Long shot" was released on February 24, 2021 under KADOKAWA, and was used as the second opening theme to the second season of the anime series [Re:Zero − Starting Life in Another World](https://anilist.co/anime/119661).
